description: This rich and earthy soup has smoky flavours and a salty feta topping.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Beetroot Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the tomatoes and beetroot and then toss in the olive oil in a baking tray.
Bake the tomatoes and beetroot in the oven for 30 minutes.
Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat and add the vegetable stock and garlic to simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove the roast veg from the oven and add to the saucepan and simmer for 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat and using a hand blender, blitz until smooth before serving with crumbled feta and seasoning to taste.
